page.title: 17School Lessons
page.content: Our first lesson is Maths.We use Scottish Primary Mathematics as our Text Books,Stage One to Stage Five.I'm working on stage five and I average about one to one and a half pages a day.At the moment I'm revising Decimal fractions.After Maths we have a break in which we try to get going a game of Tiggy behind the line. When our break of fifteen minutes has ended we either have an English lesson or we have a composition lesson.If its English the text books we use ase Nelson Grammar III which I like best, Junior English III,Basic Speech Punctuation sheets One to Twenty ,Reading Clues,Stretch Two Reading With Purpose III and sometimes Junior English IV Text Book. If its Composition we normally choose a title from the board or if I had a recent holiday,outing or have
